parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions "PSD" (Partidul Social Democrat), a parliamentary candidate party.  This directly refers to a political party participating in the elections, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. This is a paid Facebook post, targeting a wide geographical area (multiple cities in Botoșani County and surrounding areas) and age ranges, clearly intended for public consumption, not private communication. This satisfies the "public" aspect of Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The post's message ("PSD te-a vrut tăcut... A venit vremea schimbării! NOI suntem VOCEA! NOI decidem pe 1 decembrie!") directly aims to influence voters' choices in the upcoming December 1st election. It criticizes the PSD and implicitly encourages voters to choose an alternative ("NOI suntem VOCEA"). This strongly suggests an electoral objective, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - c. The use of hashtags further amplifies the reach and intended impact.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post uses some journalistic elements (headline-style phrasing), its primary purpose is not objective reporting or analysis.  The strong, opinionated language and clear call to action ("NOI decidem") disqualify it from being considered journalistic in nature. It lacks the neutrality expected of journalistic content.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post does not express a personal opinion; instead, it presents a partisan political message aimed at swaying public opinion towards a specific outcome in the election.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1824225495050389</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by "Vocea - Dorohoi," clearly constitutes electoral propaganda. It directly refers to the PSD, a parliamentary candidate, uses strong language to criticize them, and explicitly calls on voters to make a choice on December 1st. The targeting of specific geographical areas in Botoșani County further emphasizes its intention to influence the election outcome.  While the post doesn't explicitly endorse a specific alternative party, the implicit call to action ("NOI decidem") and the negative portrayal of the PSD strongly suggest an attempt to sway voters away from them. The paid nature of the post, its wide reach, and its clear political objective all point towards a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Partidul Social Democrat (PSD)</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Vocea Dorohoi</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Vocea Dorohoi, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 1824225495050389) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu un buget sub 100 RON, care conține propagandă electorală negativă îndreptată împotriva Partidului Social Democrat (PSD). Postarea, vizibilă unui public larg în județul Botoșani și zonele limitrofe, utilizează un limbaj puternic și o chemare explicită la acțiune ("NOI decidem pe 1 decembrie!"), având ca efect electoral influențarea negativă a voturilor pentru PSD.  Conținutul ("PSD te-a vrut tăcut... A venit vremea schimbării!") este clar orientat politic și nu se încadrează în jurnalismul obiectiv.  Datele din Ad Library indică o estimare a impactului de 3000-4000 de impresii și o rază de acțiune de 100.000-500.000 de persoane, amplificând efectul propagandistic. Contact: office@voceadorohoi.ro, +40759112233.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
